Table of Contents

Interface ICategoryService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for managing category-related business logic and operations. Acts as an abstraction layer between UI/presentation and data repositories, coordinating hierarchical category management, feed organization, and optimized statistics.

public interface ICategoryService

Remarks

This service centralizes all category-related use cases in the RSS reader application, ensuring consistent business rules, validation, and transaction boundaries. All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns.

Implementations must ensure:

  • All read operations are efficient and memory-safe (pagination, server-side filtering).
  • Category operations maintain hierarchical integrity and referential integrity with feeds.
  • Statistics are cached or computed efficiently to avoid N+1 queries.
  • All operations support cancellation via CancellationToken.

Methods

CategoryExistsByNameAsync(string, CancellationToken)

Checks if a category with the specified name already exists.

Task<bool> CategoryExistsByNameAsync(string name, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

name string

The category name to check.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<bool>

True if a category with this name exists; otherwise false.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if name is null, empty, or whitespace.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

CreateCategoryAsync(CreateCategoryDto, CancellationToken)

Creates a new category with automatic sort order assignment.

Task<CategoryDto> CreateCategoryAsync(CreateCategoryDto createDto, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

createDto CreateCategoryDto

The DTO containing category creation data.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<CategoryDto>

The newly created category DTO with generated ID and sort order.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if createDto is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if createDto has invalid data.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if a category with the same name already exists.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

DeleteCategoryAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Deletes a category by its ID.

Task<bool> DeleteCategoryAsync(int categoryId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

categoryId int

The ID of the category to delete.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<bool>

True if deletion was successful; otherwise false (e.g., category not found).

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if categoryId is less than or equal to 0.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the category contains feeds and deletion is not allowed.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetAllCategoriesAsync(CancellationToken)

Retrieves all categories with their feed and unread counts populated.

Task<List<CategoryDto>> GetAllCategoriesAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<List<CategoryDto>>

A list of all categories with calculated statistics.

Exceptions

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetAllCategoriesWithFeedsAsync(CancellationToken)

Retrieves all categories with their associated feeds fully populated. Optimized for scenarios requiring complete category-feed relationships.

Task<List<CategoryDto>> GetAllCategoriesWithFeedsAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<List<CategoryDto>>

A list of categories with populated feed collections.

Remarks

Use with caution as this loads all categories and their feeds into memory. Consider pagination or lazy loading for large datasets on low-resource machines.

Exceptions

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetCategoryByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Retrieves a specific category by ID with populated feed and unread counts.

Task<CategoryDto?> GetCategoryByIdAsync(int categoryId, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

categoryId int

The unique identifier of the category.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<CategoryDto>

The category DTO with statistics or null if not found.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if categoryId is less than or equal to 0.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

GetCategoryTreeAsync(CancellationToken)

Builds a complete category tree with hierarchical structure.

Task<List<CategoryTreeDto>> GetCategoryTreeAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<List<CategoryTreeDto>>

Hierarchical tree of categories with populated children collections.

Remarks

This method recursively builds the category hierarchy. Implementations should optimize to avoid multiple database round-trips and minimize memory allocation for deep hierarchies.

Exceptions

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

ReorderCategoriesAsync(ReorderCategoriesDto, CancellationToken)

Reorders categories based on the provided list of IDs.

Task<bool> ReorderCategoriesAsync(ReorderCategoriesDto reorderDto, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

reorderDto ReorderCategoriesDto

The DTO containing reordering information.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<bool>

True if reordering was successful; otherwise false.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if reorderDto is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if the category ID list is empty or contains duplicates.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if any category ID in the list does not exist.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

UpdateCategoryAsync(int, UpdateCategoryDto, CancellationToken)

Updates an existing category.

Task<CategoryDto?> UpdateCategoryAsync(int categoryId, UpdateCategoryDto updateDto, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

categoryId int

The ID of the category to update.

updateDto UpdateCategoryDto

The DTO containing updated category data.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<CategoryDto>

The updated category DTO or null if category not found.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if updateDto is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if categoryId is less than or equal to 0.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if another category with the same name already exists.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.
